body.p: The Committee decided to follow the principles in IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors on transition. It decided to require recognition of any predecessor stripping asset balances (see paragraph A3) as at the beginning of the earliest period presented, in opening retained earnings at that date, if such balances could not be identified with a remaining component of the ore body that was made more accessible by the stripping activity.
